document.full_text: under pressure from fellow u.n. member states, syria dropped plans to run for a seat on the top u.n. human rights body and allowed kuwait to replace it as a candidate, u.n. diplomats said on tuesday.
document.title: kuwait, not syria, to run for u.n. rights body: envoys
lines_and_colors: under pressure from fellow u.n. member states, syria dropped plans to run for a seat on the top u.n. human rights body and allowed kuwait to replace it as a candidate, u.n. diplomats said on tuesday.
